title: Love for Lamar, Belichick Upset, and Blazing 5 picks
itunes:title: Love for Lamar, Belichick Upset, and Blazing 5 picks
description:
Colin talks about how much he enjoys watching Lamar Jackson but criticizes people who bash teams for letting him drop in the draft. He gives his thoughts about Troy Aikman’s comments on the Cowboys, Bill Belichick being upset over the new Patriots cheating scandal, and offers his new Blazing picks for the weekend. Guests include Eric Dickerson, Peter King, Bernard Pollard, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
